text: Mahmoud Abdel Razek Fadlallah (; born 5 March 1986), or Shikabala () is an Egyptian footballer. He plays for Al-Raed FC on loan from Zamalek. == International career == === International goals === International goals by date, venue, cap, opponent, score, result and competition No. Date Venue Cap Opponent Score Result Competition 1 12 June 2007 Sabah Al Salem Stadium, Kuwait City, Kuwait 2 Kuwait 1–1 1–1 Friendly 2 12 November 2017 Baba Yara Stadium, Kumasi, Ghana 26 Ghana 1–0 1–1 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification == Honors == === Club === ; Zamalek * Egyptian Premier League: 2002–03, 2003–04 * Egypt Cup: 2002, 2008, 2013, 2016, 2018 * Egyptian Super Cup: 2016 * CAF Champions League: 2002 * CAF Super Cup: 2003 * Arab Champions Cup: 2003 === National Team === * African Cup of Nations: 2010 * World Military Cup: 2007 === Individual === * Egyptian Premier League top goalscorer: 2010–11 (Shared with Ahmed Abd El-Zaher) == References == == Other websites == * * Egyptian Players Abroad: Mahmoud Fadlalla Shikaala – FC PAOK (Greece), SoccerEgypt.com Category:1986 births Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Living people Category:Egypt international footballers
title: Shikabala
